title: Why Apper Stands Out
subtitle: What makes us different from other platforms

sections.heading: Why Apper Stands Out
sections.content: In a crowded market of app-building tools, Apper takes a fundamentally different approach. While others require you to learn their platform, Apper learns from you. It's the difference between speaking a new language and having a conversation in your own words.

sections.heading: What Makes Us Different
sections.content: Unlike traditional no-code platforms that still require you to understand templates, drag-and-drop interfaces, and technical concepts, Apper works purely through natural conversation. You simply describe what you want, and it builds it for you.

sections.heading: Key Differentiators
items: Pure AI conversation - no templates or drag-and-drop required
Builds complete, functional apps in minutes, not hours or days
No learning curve - if you can chat, you can build apps
Instant iterations - just ask for changes in plain English
One unified platform - no need to switch between multiple tools
Real-time collaboration through shared conversations
Automatically optimized for all devices and screen sizes
Built-in best practices for performance, security, and accessibility

sections.heading: The Apper Advantage
sections.content: Traditional platforms make you adapt to their way of thinking. Apper adapts to yours. Whether you're a business owner with an idea, a designer with a vision, or a developer who wants to prototype quickly, Apper meets you where you are and builds what you need.

title: Create Your First App
subtitle: Step-by-step guide to building your first application

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.content: When you log in to Apper, you'll see a large prompt box in the center of the screen. This is where you tell Apper what kind of app you want to build, just like you're explaining it to a friend.

sections.heading: Example Prompts
sections.content: This will give you a much better starting point. Using this prompt, Apper will be able to generate your app more accurately based on your needs.

sections.heading: Step-by-Step: How to Write a Better Prompt with ChatGPT

steps.title: Open ChatGPT in a new tab
steps.description: Navigate to ChatGPT in your browser to start refining your prompt.

steps.title: Copy and paste the following prompt into ChatGPT
steps.description: "I want to build [Insert your app idea here]. Rewrite this as a detailed prompt focused on the app's main function and detailed features. It should be simple, clear, easy to understand, and ready to use in an AI app creator."

steps.title: Replace the placeholder with your actual idea
steps.description: Replace the part that says [Insert your app idea here] with your actual idea. For example: I want to build an app that helps users book yoga classes and pay online.

steps.title: Get the improved version from ChatGPT
steps.description: ChatGPT will rewrite your idea into a cleaner, more detailed prompt.

steps.title: Copy and paste into Apper
steps.description: Copy the improved version ChatGPT gives you, and paste it into the Apper prompt box.

title: Editing and Expanding the App
subtitle: Learn how to modify and enhance your app

sections.heading: Making Changes
sections.content: Once your app is generated, you can chat with Apper to make changes and add new features. Simply describe what you want to modify or add, and Apper will update your app accordingly.

sections.heading: Example Modifications
items: Ask for design changes: 'Make the buttons bigger and blue'
Add new features: 'Add a search function to find orders quickly'
Modify existing features: 'Change the payment form to include PayPal'
Request layout changes: 'Move the menu to the top of the page'

sections.heading: Expansion Options
items: Add new pages and sections as your business grows
Integrate third-party services and APIs
Set up user accounts and membership systems
Add e-commerce functionality and payment processing

Create custom workflows and automation

title: Troubleshooting Errors

sections.heading: Common Issues
sections.content: Don't worry if you encounter issues while building - it's part of the learning process! Most problems have simple solutions, and our platform provides helpful error messages to guide you.

items: Clear your browser cache if the editor seems slow

Refresh the page if components aren't loading
Use the undo feature to revert unwanted changes

Check our knowledge base for detailed troubleshooting guides
